top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
Who would have thought pop-funk would translate to metal so well! The riffage! The three of you together is quite something! Making Phil Collins creepy...Hotel California... just...wow! MORE!

comments_since_last_sample.body: That first verse - knew from then it was going to be Epic!

It's got it's own touch. Although the original is better, I do have to say that it's quite interesting somewhat studying your version. I really like it how you can just change a song so much and make it your own. Love it, keep up the great work!!!!
